Blog.post: 30th July, me worked @ LTK 5 yrs oreadi leh, time passing so fast hor~ my anniversaries of working.. haha! hope i can continue other 5 yrs @ LTK lor, cuz this is nice company i never met (sure lah i never left this company, haha!) but still hope someday i can work @ s'pore... now still hard to find a job there... pls pray for me.. i need support!!!!
yeah! can use the internet on my own pc liao, haiz! me waiting a whole week leh.. hehe!

yoz! got the new pc liao... so excited... me wanted it so long time ago.. but now, got it liao!!! yeah! tat's LCD monitor oso, but quite ex leh.. =.=" but sh*t, internet still can't use, need to wait on this friday! damn!!! ~_~"

today, me, bro. + cousin followed my mom went to Shen Zheng for massage. Wowz! i am a choosy lady, but never tot there quite clean hor... me chose 2 hrs for body massage + 2 hrs for legs massage... total 4 hrs, but only HKD 158 (SGD34)... the price is okie leh.... so relax, so comfortable, but a bit hurt, a bit tried.. =.= although me hate China's place, but i think i will go there again on next month lor.. only for massge hor !! :p

typhoon No.8 - KOMPASU reached HK liao! hahaha! glad we can back home now, and got half day "holiday", yoz! this is the 1st typhoon on this year, hope next typhoon come to hk hor, juz wind is ok, pls DON'T rain, k!?!?!?! hahaha! now back home lu.. have a good sleep! :P good!

got the double pay today liao, quite excited, but.. i think i need to use them, cuz i need to buy a new pc wif LCD monitor, sh*t! so expensive of the LCD leh... n i need save some $$, save them for me buy the ticket to s'pore... i think i can go there again very soon liao =) hehe...

me got a sick today.. so "xin ku"... i really can't use the brain to think anythingz... so empty... my arms, my legs, my body, my soul so tired.. can't move... only PIN is my medicine, if he give me wishes, i will recover liao... * sh*t! angie, are you dreaming huh?! * * yes, i am dreaming, dreaming the things never come true!! * ~~~>_
hihi.. nice to meet u all~~~
Today is my 1st stepping lesson, i haven't done the exe so much like this time, but the feeling not bad, qutie good :) yeah! i will contiune to learn leh, i wanna got a good fit body mah.. hehe!
